tiles.name: Strip 1 Other
tiles.text: Choose someone to remove an article of clothing.

tiles.name: Tribal Council
tiles.text: Vote one person out of the game. If tied, the next person in turn is out.

tiles.name: Lurch
tiles.text: The tallest person at the table must take 4 drinks then give 4 drinks.

tiles.name: Gary Coleman
tiles.text: The shortest person at the table must take 4 drinks then give 4 drinks.

tiles.name: Touchy Movey
tiles.text: Everyone must remove the first piece they touch.

tiles.name: Hillbilly
tiles.text: You must play the rest of the game wearing no shoes or socks.

tiles.name: Beauty Swap
tiles.text: Switch places with the most beautiful person playing the game.

tiles.name: Hands Across America
tiles.text: You must keep physical contact with the person to your right for the remainder of the game.

tiles.name: Wonder Twin Powers, Activate!
tiles.text: Choose someone to drink with you for the rest of the game (they drink when you do, and vice versa).

tiles.name: Battle of the Sexes
tiles.text: Everyone whose gender is opposite yours must take 1 drink.
